price: Hebu waulize: Je! Wao ni wenye umbo gumu zaidi au hao wengine tulio waumba. Hakika Sisi tuliwaumba wao kwa udongo unao nata.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَم مَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآۚ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٖ لَّازِبِۭ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Hebu waulize hao wanao kanya kufufuliwa wanao ona hayawi hayo: Je! Kwani kuwaumba wao hawa ni kugumu zaidi au kuziumba mbingu, na ardhi, na nyota, na vyenginevyo, tulivyo viumba Sisi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-is'taftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnā innā khalaqnāhum min ṭīnin lāzibin
